Recipe.title: Fry Sauce
Recipe.Description:
One of the burger joints in Utah decided to create a special sauce into which you could dip French fries. It wasn't long until long until there were a lot of different versions.
Here is the basic recipe.

section.instruction: In a small bowl, mix all ingredients.

Notes.note: In Washington, very few joints have Fry Sauce, so when we are eating at a sit-down burger joint there, Ransom will ask for the ingredients and an empty soup cup then mix up a batch right there. &smiley;

Modifications.modification: Add 1 teaspoon Horseradish Sauce to give it extra zing.
